original_title: Trump administration to vet legal immigrants for 'anti-American' and  antisemitism | Fox News
article_summary: Trump Administration to Vet Immigrants for Anti-American, Terrorist, or Antisemitic Views under New Guidance. USCIS officers have been instructed to consider such views as "overwhelmingly negative factors" when deciding on green cards, visas, or citizenship. The guidance applies to both new and pending applications.</s>
